name: Zombie Derby: Pixel Survival
description:
Smash your way through hordes of zombies and countless obstacles in a rip-roaring racing arcade.



Experience the zombie apocalypse like you’ve never seen it before. Eradicating zombies has never been so colorful, exciting, and engaging before.

Key features

  • Crush zombies and blow through obstacles!
  • Buy and upgrade cars!
  • Explore levels!
  • Complete tasks!
  • Full HD gameplay and playable at 60fps!

Soundtrack

Soundtrack by professional guitarist Dmitry Trots, featuring a total of 4 tracks from Zombie Derby: Pixel Survival in MP3 format! The Soundtrack will be placed in your Zombie Derby: Pixel Survival folder in the Steam directory:

...Steam\steamapps\common\Zombie Derby: Pixel Survival\Soundtrack

P.S. We did not dare to make the PC version for a long time, but since many fans of the mobile version wanted to play with full access to the content on the PC, we decided to go for the desires of our players.
